```r
ml_SD <- lmer(
  sens_fin ~ 
    episode_re * sleep_disturbed_sd + 
    Condition + 
    site + 
    (1|ID), 
  REML = FALSE,
  data = data_lf
  )
summary(ml_SD)
```
